subject: Will Anyone Else Make This GUARANTEE For You?
body:
What do you think?Do you REALLY no how to market on the Internet? Do you REALLY know how to get an endless supply of QUALITY leads coming to look at your site? Can you REALLY make money without a MENTOR ? Can you REALLY afford to work without someone who will hold your hand and help you make you first $1000 within your first couple days? No! YOU CAN'T.
Will anyone else GUARANTEE this for you? 
My Name is Rich Wilson and I will personally take you by the hand and show you exactly how my mentor showed me how he made $6000 last week. 
Can you REALLY afford to work with people that won't personally guide you to success?
I will personally GUARANTEE your first $1,000 sign up. 
Go to: http://go2-url.com/aaxxne 
First you will see a movie describing this business and what is in it for you.
Next you will see an amazing site that tells it all with Videos, Audios and text to give you the meat and potatoes of the most exciting and profitable business on the internet, bar none!  If you do not go through this site completely and check out every detail of this business you will want to cut your throat later.  For your sake, check it out thoroughly.  You can even sign for free go into the back office and look around.  The only thing you will not be able to do as a free member is to download any of the products.
This is longer than I had intended, but go ahead and check it out here: http://go2-url.com/aaxxneyou will be glad you did.
